short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Retro Sunset extension will help you keep track of the time while enjoying a soothing new tab design.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Refresh your new tab with Retro Sunset!

This addon has been thoughtfully developed to make users' time spent on the web more efficient. Retro Sunset is an excellent choice for whether you want to work or when you just want to relax and have fun. Especially for those who enjoy watching the sunset!

By clicking "Add to Chrome", you accept and agree to installing the Retro Sunset extension and setting Chrome™ new tab to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. The extension will update your search settings, change your search engine, and display Microsoft Bing results.

The fact that you are able to design the wallpaper in whatever way you see fit is one of our favourite aspects about it. Simply moving your cursor will cause the sun to change, and as a result, you will see a whole new background. While you are taking in your preferred rendition of the Sunset, you can effortlessly navigate the internet by using the Search Box.

The bookmark function is also a useful tool. This will make it so that you can easily go to the websites that you want to visit most. After you have visited a certain page a certain number of times, we will make a tiny icon for it on your new tab so that you may access it whenever you like.

Our browser extension has been designed to enhance your browsing experience in the best possible way. In order to achieve this, the we gather your data for statistical analysis. This data assists us in comprehending how you engage with online content, enabling us to fine-tune and optimise the extension’s features according to your preferences. We prioritise your privacy and security, employing strict measures to ensure that the data collected for these statistics is both anonymised and aggregated, preventing any connection to personal information. Our ultimate aim is to consistently refine and tailor your browsing encounter, ultimately providing an online experience that is not only enjoyable but also uniquely attuned to your needs. Should you have any questions or reservations, we encourage you to consult our privacy policy or reach out to us directly for clarification.

Use these links if you have more questions:
